title: LOL Talent Show: Chi fa ridere è dentro
overview: Straight from the world of LOL comes LOL Talent Show: Chi fa ridere è dentro! Get ready for a barrage of aspiring comedians and an exciting contest hosted by Forest, the magician! Three judges: Elio, Katia Follesa, and Angelo Pintus. Their mission? To find the tenth contestant for LOL 4! They'll travel through Italy and be assisted by a different guest judge on every episode.
